trans-unit.source: Converts the structure to the array of strings

seg-source.mrk: Converts the structure to the array of strings

target.mrk: Converts the structure to the array of strings

trans-unit.source: The structure to convert. This structure should be same as for _WinAPI_ArrayToStruct().

seg-source.mrk: This structure should be same as for _WinAPI_ArrayToStruct().

target.mrk: This structure should be same as for _WinAPI_ArrayToStruct().

trans-unit.source: [optional] The number of strings that contains the structure. If this parameter is 0 (Default), the end of the structure

seg-source.mrk: The number of strings that contains the structure.
If this parameter is 0 (Default), the end of the structure

target.mrk: The number of strings that contains the structure.
If this parameter is 0 (Default), the end of the structure

trans-unit.source: determined by a double null-terminated character ("... ;{0};{0}").

seg-source.mrk: determined by a double null-terminated character ("... ;{0};{0}").

target.mrk: determined by a double null-terminated character ("... ;{0};{0}").

trans-unit.source: The array of strings. The zeroth array element contains the number of strings.

seg-source.mrk: The zeroth array element contains the number of strings.

target.mrk: The zeroth array element contains the number of strings.

trans-unit.source: This function works for Unicode strings only.

seg-source.mrk: This function works for Unicode strings only.

target.mrk: This function works for Unicode strings only.
